name: Ballroom
desc: This dataset gives many informatinos on ballroom dancing. Some characteristic excerpts of many dance style are provided in real audio format. Their tempi are also available.

name: Free Spoken Digit Dataset
desc: A free audio dataset of spoken digits. Think MNIST for audio.

name: LibriSpeech
desc: LibriSpeech is a corpus of approximately 1000 hours of 16KHz read English speech, prepared by Vassil Panayotov with the assistance of Daniel Povey.

name: Urban Sound 8K Dataset
desc: This dataset contains 8732 labeled sound excerpts (<=4s) of urban sounds from 10 classes.

name: VoxCeleb
desc: This is an audio visual dataset consisting of short clips of human speech, extracted from interview videoes uploaded to YouTube
